q_ch: 对所有已经开始但是尚未完成的缝纫任务进行统计，剩余工作量最多的工作组是哪个？
q_en: Which workgroup has the highest remaining workload for all sewing tasks that have been started but not yet completed?
gt:
Hey there! Let's dive into the sewing tasks and see which workgroup has the highest remaining workload. 🧵✨

Based on the data, here's a breakdown of the workgroups and their remaining workloads:

| Workgroup Name   | Total Planned | Total Completed | Remaining Workload |
|------------------|---------------|-----------------|--------------------|
| Master Sewers    | 1260          | 1220            | 40                 |
| Skilled Sewers   | 535           | 535             | 0                  |
| Advanced Sewers  | 460           | 460             | 0                  |
| Premier Sewers   | 390           | 390             | 0                  |
| Elite Sewers     | 260           | 260             | 0                  |

From the table, it looks like the **Master Sewers** have the highest remaining workload with 40 tasks left to complete. Keep up the great work, Master Sewers! 💪🧵

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! 😊

steps.sql: SELECT id, name FROM working_group WHERE type = 'sew';
steps.description: Retrieve the IDs and names of all working groups of type 'sew'

steps.sql: SELECT working_group_id, SUM(planned_number) AS total_planned, SUM(completed_number) AS total_completed FROM sewing_tasks WHERE status = 1 GROUP BY working_group_id;
steps.description: Retrieve the total planned number and completed number of sewing tasks for each working group that have been started but not yet completed
